name: Starside: The Rescue
description:
• Windows PC only
  • Casual gun and run platformer.
  • Sidescroller.
  • Select between 3 types of lethal weapon ammunitions.
  • Can be completed in less than an hour.
  • Arcade-style life system: Infinite lives. (Enemies previously defeated stay dead.)
  • Complete all levels to unlock the final boss stage.
  • Perfect game to introduce someone to gaming!
  • Partial controller support – Main menu works best with a mouse, but the levels can be played with a keyboard (+ mouse if desired). Alternatively, with a controller.

Feel free to leave a comment after playing it, and if you like the game, please consider following us on Facebook.

https://www.facebook.com/FrostAxeEntertainment

Recommended requirements:

Intel Core i7-9750H CPU @ 2.60GHz, 2.59GHz 8 DDR4 RAM

NiVidia 1050

Windows 10

225 MB

Minimum requirement:

Intel Core i5-5200U CPU @ 2.20 GHz. 6,00 DDR3 RAM,

Intel HD Graphics 5500

Windows 10

225 MB

 

Warnings:

1. For Windows PCs only!

2. Small screens below 720p can experience slight issues. Try pressing ALT + Enter once in-game to force another aspect ratio.

3. Slower PCs below the minimum requirement will affect in-game collision. For example, bullets may pass through enemies without killing them. This could potentially make the game unbeatable.
